vistra.framework

Interface IParameterManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ParameterManager

    public interface IParameterManager
    A parameter manager interface.
    Author:
    Roland Bruggmann (brugr9@bfh.ch)

      • updateSupportedAlgorithms

        void updateSupportedAlgorithms(edu.uci.ics.jung.graph.util.EdgeType edgeType)
                               throws ParameterException
        Updates the list of selectable algorithms. Afterwards, the list holds all and only the algorithms capable to traverse edges as given by type.
        Parameters:
        edgeType - the edge type
        Throws:
        ParameterException

      • executeAlgorithm

        ITraversal executeAlgorithm(ILayoutGraph g)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Traverses a graph as given by executing the algorithm. Returns a traversal as immutable list of ISteps generated during the execution of the algorithm.
        Parameters:
        g - the graph to traverse
        Returns:
        the traversal
        Throws:
        ParameterException
        java.lang.Exception
